nodes.text: Dust stalkers were a predatory species native to the Madlands on the planet Weik in Wild Space.

Similar in appearance to the acklay, dust stalkers were native to the Madlands on the planet Weik. A six-legged insectoid with razor-sharp teeth and two large grabbing arms protruding from its back, the dust stalker was extremely vicious and violent. A dust stalker was released from captivity by Orl Miscord during the Galactic Civil War in a plot to kill the caravan's owner, Sala Vindako.
